abstract: Alibaba and Yahoo Japan’s majority stakeholder, Softbank, plan to reach out to Yahoo’s chief executive to discuss whether an alternative transaction is possible, a person briefed on the matter said..
snippet: Alibaba and Yahoo Japan’s majority stakeholder, Softbank, plan to reach out to Yahoo’s chief executive to discuss whether an alternative transaction is possible, a person briefed on the matter said..

headline.main: Yahoo’s Talks With Alibaba and Softbank Said to Have Collapsed

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
